mapper.sql: alarm_info_code, alarm_level_code, alarm_time, alarm_origin, content, handle, handle_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into alarm_info (alarm_info_code, alarm_level_code, alarm_time, alarm_origin, content, handle, handle_time, status) values (#{alarmInfoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmLevelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into alarm_info
alarm_info_code,
alarm_level_code,
alarm_time,

content,
handle,

status,

mapper.update:
update alarm_info
alarm_level_code = #{alarmLevelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_origin = #{alarmOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle = #{handle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_time = #{handleTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where alarm_info_code = #{alarmInfoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update alarm_info set alarm_level_code = #{alarmLevelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_origin = #{alarmOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle = #{handle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_time = #{handleTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where alarm_info_code = #{alarmInfoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from alarm_info where 1=1
and alarm_info_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{alarmInfoCode},'%')
and alarm_level_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{alarmLevelCode},'%')
and alarm_origin LIKE CONCAT('%',#{alarmOrigin},'%')
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and DATE_FORMAT(alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{alarmTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{alarmTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(handle_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{handleTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(handle_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{handleTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
order by alarm_info_code desc

select count(1) from alarm_info where 1=1
and alarm_info_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{alarmInfoCode},'%')
and alarm_level_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{alarmLevelCode},'%')
and alarm_origin LIKE CONCAT('%',#{alarmOrigin},'%')
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and DATE_FORMAT(alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{alarmTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{alarmTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(handle_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{handleTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(handle_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{handleTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')

select
from alarm_info where 1=1
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by alarm_time desc
